posts.post_content:
-Design Team-
  
   
Member1- I have an Idea for a new demon.
  
Member2- We're not going to make a Demon version of [Baneslayer Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Baneslayer Angel).
  
Member1- No, no, not making that mistake again. Besides, we're already reprinting Baneslayer. I was just going to suggest a 9/9 for 9cmc that has flying, trample, no drawbacks, and an alternative cost so people can cheat him into play as early as turn one.
  
Member2- ...fine, but make it mythic and give it some kickass art.
posts.html:
-Design Team-

Member1- I have an Idea for a new demon.
Member2- We're not going to make a Demon version of Baneslayer Angel.
Member1- No, no, not making that mistake again. Besides, we're already reprinting Baneslayer. I was just going to suggest a 9/9 for 9cmc that has flying, trample, no drawbacks, and an alternative cost so people can cheat him into play as early as turn one.
Member2- ...fine, but make it mythic and give it some kickass art.

In a mock draft, on turn 2:   
Me: Play these 2 1-drops, sac all 3 for my Demon of Death's Gate! \*maniacal laughter\*  
Them: End of turn, [Unsummon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unsummon).  
Me: \*SADDEST PANDA\*

posts.post_content:
Heres a deckidea if someone gets a playset (based on m11 releases so far)  
  
Creatures- 24  
x4 [Viscera Seer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Viscera Seer)  
x4 Rea$$embling Skeleton (sorry no autocard, they need to fix cencor badly)  
x4 [Death Cultist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death Cultist)   
x4 [Mortician Beetle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mortician Beetle)  
x4 [Vampire Lacerator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vampire Lacerator)   
x4 [Demon of Death's Gate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Demon of Death's Gate)   
  
Others- 14  
x4 [Duress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Duress)  
x3 [Disentomb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Disentomb )    
x3 [Diabolic Tutor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diabolic Tutor)   
x3 [Sign in Blood](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sign in Blood)   
x1 [Corrupt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Corrupt)   
  
Lands- 22  
x22 [Swamp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Swamp)  
  
He so screams, build your deck around me! Plus if you dont have him in your opening hand, your beetles can win it for you. A dream hand would be t1 lacerator, t2 skellytons, t3 drop beetles, any other 1 drop, and duress, then summon your demon and pump your beetles. True you could have gotten him out on t2, but its safer to duress right before you drop him. Another good combo is chump... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

posts.post_content:
@Temple\_Garden  
JUST LIKE ALMOST EVERY SINGLE GOOD CREATURE OUT THERE.  
But this is black, which runs graveyard recursion, and loves sacrificing and paying life, as well as being impervious to half the removal out there.   
That he can be killed by some removal cards means those removal cards are really good, not the he is really terrible. (In fact, the removal cards are made all the more great by his greatness.)

posts.post_content:
[Reassembling Skeletons](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reassembling Skeletons), [Bloodghast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bloodghast)...and with Shard Rotating [Condemn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Condemn) will be the new removal for a bit..I dont see why people dont see the potential. Oh no, hes at the bottom of my Library. [Diabolic Tutor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diabolic Tutor), [Liliana Vess](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Liliana Vess), can get him right back! THINK PEOPLE!
  
   
Put the deck together, it struggles with white ([Path to Exile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Path to Exile)), but in all it isnt TERRIBLE. Tournament worhty? Probably not. Massive fun in casual? Heck yes!

Posted By: NeoSin (8/11/2010 5:29:29 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Pretty good representation of one of black's core flavor aspects. It's all about risk. You bring him out on turn three or even earlier, you have a gigantic, terrifying threat that will end the game in no time. If he gets Pathed, you just lost all your creatures and took a 6-life hit. Is it worth it? I think so. So he gets Pathed every once in a while and you lose. So what? If he survives, you win, most likely. Talk about a fun card.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
So with Mirrodin Besieged out soon, I'm gonna be making an awesome deck with this guy to get him out on turn two often enough to make it worth it.  
  
Starting Hand: 3 Flayer Husk(these besieged cards are what make this shine), 1 Demon of Death's Gate, 2 land, other (cards can be made up slightly by drawing, which will make this more possible)  
  
Turn 1: land, Flayer Husk.  
Turn 2: land, 2 more Flayer Husk, pull out your pretty new demon by sacing the 0/0 germs and paying 6 life.  
Turn 3: land, equip a Flayer Husk to Demon of Death's Gate, swing for 10 in the air.  
Turn 4: land, equip the other two Flayer Husks to him, swing for 12 in the air. victory unless trampling over fliers first.  
Turn 5: victory.  
  
Obviously, he is vulnerable to white or blue removal, but even if you only get him to survive for one swing it is worth it.
